system.effect: An artifact that roughly maps Warp Gates throughout the Galaxy. When approaching a Warp Gate, a Navigator must make a +0 Navigate (Warp) Test to identify location, then -20 Navigate (Warp) Test to transverse through it. On success,  vessel reaches intended destination, on failiure it arrives elsewhere. ~40% of Systems have Warp Gates in 2d10 Days of Travel.
